languages.text: Ранг противника обозначается римской цифрой от I до VII на иконке этого противника. Чем выше ранг, тем сильнее враг. Жалкий серф с дрянным снаряжением соответствует I рангу, в то время как ранг VII обозначает воистину грозного противника.

An enemy's difficulty tier is indicated by the number from I to VII on their icon. The higher the difficulty tier, the stronger the enemy. A wretched, poorly equipped serf would likely be a difficulty tier I enemy, while anyone of difficulty tier VII is a truly fearsome foe.
languages.original_text: Ранг противника обозначается римской цифрой от I до VII на иконке этого противника. Чем выше ранг, тем сильнее враг. Жалкий серф с дрянным снаряжением соответствует I рангу, в то время как ранг VII обозначает воистину грозного противника.

traits.locale_text: An enemy's difficulty tier is indicated by the number from I to VII on their icon. The higher the difficulty tier, the stronger the enemy. A wretched, poorly equipped serf would likely be a difficulty tier I enemy, while anyone of difficulty tier VII is a truly fearsome foe.

An enemy's difficulty tier is indicated by the number from I to VII on their icon. The higher the difficulty tier, the stronger the enemy. A wretched, poorly equipped serf would likely be a difficulty tier I enemy, while anyone of difficulty tier VII is a truly fearsome foe.

An enemy's difficulty tier is indicated by the number from I to VII on their icon. The higher the difficulty tier, the stronger the enemy. A wretched, poorly equipped serf would likely be a difficulty tier I enemy, while anyone of difficulty tier VII is a truly fearsome foe.

languages.text: Der Schwierigkeitsgrad eines Gegners wird durch eine Zahl von I bis VII auf seinem Symbol angezeigt. Je höher der Schwierigkeitsgrad, desto stärker ist der Gegner. Ein erbärmlicher, schlecht ausgerüsteter Bediensteter ist wahrscheinlich ein Gegner des Schwierigkeitsgrads I, während ein Gegner des Schwierigkeitsgrads VII ein wirklich furchterregender Feind ist.
languages.original_text: An enemy's difficulty tier is indicated by the number from I to VII on their icon. The higher the difficulty tier, the stronger the enemy. A wretched, poorly equipped serf would likely be a difficulty tier I enemy, while anyone of difficulty tier VII is a truly fearsome foe.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsgrad{/g} eines Gegners wird durch eine Zahl von I bis VII auf seinem Symbol angezeigt. Je höher der Schwierigkeitsgrad, desto stärker ist der Gegner. Ein erbärmlicher, schlecht ausgerüsteter Bediensteter ist wahrscheinlich ein Gegner des Schwierigkeitsgrads I, während ein Gegner des Schwierigkeitsgrads VII ein wirklich furchterregender Gegner ist.

languages.text: Le niveau de difficulté d'un ennemi est représenté par un chiffre compris entre I et VII sur son icône. Plus le niveau de difficulté est élevé, plus l'ennemi est puissant. Ainsi, un pauvre serf mal équipé sera probablement un ennemi de niveau I, tandis qu'un ennemi de niveau VII sera vraiment redoutable.
languages.original_text: An enemy's difficulty tier is indicated by the number from I to VII on their icon. The higher the difficulty tier, the stronger the enemy. A wretched, poorly equipped serf would likely be a difficulty tier I enemy, while anyone of difficulty tier VII is a truly fearsome foe.

traits.locale_text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} d'un ennemi est indiqué par un nombre compris entre I et VII sur son icône. Plus le niveau de difficulté est élevé, plus l'ennemi est puissant. Un pauvre serf mal équipé sera probablement un ennemi de niveau I, tandis qu'un ennemi de niveau VII sera vraiment redoutable.

languages.text: 敌人的难度等级以图标中的罗马数字“I”到“VII”表示。难度等级越高，敌人就越强大。难度等级为I级的敌人，通常都是手持各种临时武器的农奴，而难度等级为VII级的敌人，则是极其恐怖的威胁。
languages.original_text: An enemy's difficulty tier is indicated by the number from I to VII on their icon. The higher the difficulty tier, the stronger the enemy. A wretched, poorly equipped serf would likely be a difficulty tier I enemy, while anyone of difficulty tier VII is a truly fearsome foe.

traits.locale_text: 敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}以图标中的罗马数字“I”到“VII”表示。难度等级越高，敌人就越强大。难度等级为I级的敌人，通常都是手持各种临时武器的农奴，而难度等级为VII级的敌人，则是极其恐怖的威胁。

languages.original_text: An enemy's difficulty tier is indicated by the number from I to VII on their icon. The higher the difficulty tier, the stronger the enemy. A wretched, poorly equipped serf would likely be a difficulty tier I enemy, while anyone of difficulty tier VII is a truly fearsome foe.

languages.text: El nivel de desafío se indica con un número del I al VII en su icono. Cuanto mayor sea, más fuerte es el enemigo. Un pastor enfermo y sin equipamiento adecuado sería un enemigo de nivel de desafío I, mientras que cualquier criatura con nivel de desafío VII es un enemigo aterrador.
languages.original_text: An enemy's difficulty tier is indicated by the number from I to VII on their icon. The higher the difficulty tier, the stronger the enemy. A wretched, poorly equipped serf would likely be a difficulty tier I enemy, while anyone of difficulty tier VII is a truly fearsome foe.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} se indica con un número del I al VII en su icono. Cuanto mayor sea, más fuerte es el enemigo. Un pastor enfermo y sin equipamiento adecuado sería un enemigo de nivel de desafío I, mientras que cualquier criatura con nivel de desafío VII es un enemigo aterrador.

languages.text: 敵の脅威度はアイコンのIからVIIの数字で表される。脅威度が高いほど敵は強くなる。装備が貧弱な農奴であれば脅威度はIであろうし、脅威度がVIIであれば恐ろしい敵だと考えられる。
languages.original_text: An enemy's difficulty tier is indicated by the number from I to VII on their icon. The higher the difficulty tier, the stronger the enemy. A wretched, poorly equipped serf would likely be a difficulty tier I enemy, while anyone of difficulty tier VII is a truly fearsome foe.

traits.locale_text: 敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}はアイコンのIからVIIの数字で表される。脅威度が高いほど敵は強くなる。装備が貧弱な農奴であれば脅威度はIであろうし、脅威度がVIIであれば恐ろしい敵だと考えられる。

languages.text: Bir düşmanın zorluk derecesi, simgesindeki I'den VII'ye kadar olan sayı ile ifade edilir. Zorluk derecesi ne kadar yüksekse düşman da o kadar güçlüdür. Teçhizatı dökülen, pejmürde kılıklı birisinin zorluk derecesi muhtemelen I olurken zorluk derecesi VII olan bir düşman ise grubuna kök söktürecektir.
languages.original_text: An enemy's difficulty tier is indicated by the number from I to VII on their icon. The higher the difficulty tier, the stronger the enemy. A wretched, poorly equipped serf would likely be a difficulty tier I enemy, while anyone of difficulty tier VII is a truly fearsome foe.
